Interface IPathIntersectionOptions

Options to pass to path.intersection()

interface IPathIntersectionOptions {
    excludeTangents?: boolean;
    out_AreOverlapped?: boolean;
    path1Offset?: IPoint;
    path2Offset?: IPoint;
}
